product_name: BIC Sport ACE-TEC Wing Stand Up Paddleboard - 12' 6"
long_description: Designed for medium and large paddlers, this high-performance paddleboard has excellent glide, making it a great choice for fitness paddling, flatwater cruising, ocean touring and recreational racing.
short_description: Designed for medium and large paddlers, this high-performance paddleboard has excellent glide, making it a great choice for fitness paddling, flatwater cruising, ocean touring and recreational racing.
